title: CT300-E UAV TT&C and Information Transmission System
explain:
CT300-E UAV TT&C and Information Transmission System

The CT300-E is a L-band UAV TT&C (Telemetry, Telecontrol and Communication) and information transmission system and designed to complete telecontrol/telemetry information and payload reconnaissance image transmission of UAV system，and operation/control of UAV as well.

Functions

  • Information transmission
    • Real-time transmission of uplink telecontrol information
    • Real-time transmission of downlink telemetry and reconnaissance information
    • Encryption/de-encryption of uplink/ downlink information
  • Positioning
    • Tracking angle-measurement of UAV
    • Ranging of UAV
    • The position of UAV could be resolved after angle-measurement and ranging
  • Control
    • Planning and control of flight missions and display of flight path and status
    • Payload control and reconnaissance information processing and display
    • Data record and playback
Specifications
Operational distance30km~200km（LOS）
Operational bandL-band
Uplink telecontrol code rate6.4 kbps /12.8kbps
Downlink compound code rate2Mbps/4Mbps
Weight of Air-borne equipment≤4kg
Power consumption of Air-borne equipment15W/DC+24V
120W/DC+28V
Tracking angle-measurement accuracy≤20mrad（RMS）(100km)
≤10mrad（RMS）（200km）
Ranging accuracy≤50m（RMS）
features:
Man-pack Remote Video Terminal

Man-pack Remote Video Terminal (RVT), acting as an optional and auxiliary ground equipment of UAV telemetry and telecontrol (TT&C) information transmission system, is used for receiving reconnaissance image from single UAV.

Main Functions

  • Receiving and displaying image from single UAV
  • Receiving and displaying telemetry parameters and flight path for single UAV
  • Data record and playback
Main Specifications
Operation frequencyL-band
Max Operation Distance50km
Antenna TypeOmni-directional antenna
Continuous Operational Time of Information Processing Computer4hours
Continuous Operational Time of Receiving Combination8hours
Power SupplyAccumulator
Total Weight7.5kg
Operating Temperature－20℃～+55℃
